data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Junior Negrao is on target to give Ulsan Hyundai a 0-1 advantage.
In the minute 45, Yong-woo Kim blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Incheon.
Sung-Hwan Cho is making the team's first substitution at Incheon Football Stadium with Song Shi-uh replacing Kim Jun-beom.
In the minute 68, Ulsan Hyundai make their first substitution with Jeong Hoon-sung replacing Park Jeong-in.
The home team replace Choi Beom-kyeong with Kim Dae-jung.
Bjorn Johnsen is on a sub for Lee Dong-kyeong for Ulsan Hyundai.
In the minute 87, Gustavo is replacing Elias Aguilar for the home team.
It's 0-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Won Du-jae is replacing Junior Negrao for Ulsan Hyundai at Incheon Football Stadium.
